law.catch_line: In this section, "unit" means an officer or other entity in the Executive Branch....

text.section: In this section, "unit" means an officer or other entity in the Executive Branch.

Unless otherwise provided by statute or regulation, a unit of State government authorized by law to impose a civil penalty up to a specific dollar amount for violation of any statute or regulation shall consider the following in setting the amount of the penalty:
the severity of the violation for which the penalty is to be assessed;
the good faith of the violator; and
any history of prior violations.
